sentences: Mizuki Itagaki (板垣瑞生, Itagaki Mizuki, born 25 October 2000)  is a Japanese actor, singer and fashion model.
In 2014 he made his movie debut  Dark Gold Ushima-kun Part 2 。As well as getting a major role in Solomon's Perjury as Kazuhiko Kambara, which was released in 2015.
In 2014, he officially became a member of M!lk formed by EBiDAN at the star festival held in November 2014 。
In November 2015 he appeared in the NHK taiga drama Hana Moyu as Mōri Motoakira.
